Detailed Description

Interfaces to a serial port.

Holds a file descriptor/handler.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

PololuSerial::PololuSerial (  ) 

Open the serial port handler and do basic error checking.

The serial port is opened, currently at 9600 baud (hardcoded). In both Windows and Linux the port is setup for 9600 baud with 8 data bits, no stop bit, no parity bit and no flow control.

PololuSerial::~PololuSerial (  ) 

Close the serial port handler.
